name: War of Omens Card Game
description: War of Omens is a CCG with a unique Deckbuilder combat system and deep strategy. Set in a masterfully crafted dark fantasy world, it features fast, strategic battles with 4 distinct factions and over 20 heroes. Challenge the online ladder, conquer the story mode, or compete in a cross faction draft!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: At least 512 MB Video Memory Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
